name: MindGames
description:
Mind games is a 3D, first person horror game where the player has to navigate a maze that's trapped them inside. the catch, the whole world is the maze. they must traverse all 6 sides of the maze to try and find a way out of this continuous nightmare.

Mind Games is a game jam project that was created at Southampton Solent university.

this project was completed in four days by a group of 4 people. 

14/01/2019 - 17/01/2019

Credits go to :

Samuel Wilson: Project lead, level Design

Daniel Foyle : Programmer lead, modelling

Byron Andrews-Salvietto : Programmer, Audio, Animations

Oliver Neale : Models, Animations, Audio, Levels
